00042    MigratingVanHove::MigratingVanHove(System& system) 
00043     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00044       communicatorPtr_(0),
00045       replicaMovePtr_(&system.replicaMove()),
00046       isInitialized_(false)
00047    {  
00048       communicatorPtr_ = &(system.simulation().communicator());
00049    }

00053    {}

00056    void MigratingVanHove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00057    {
00058 
00059       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00060       readInterval(in);
00061       readOutputFileName(in);
00062 
00063       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00064       atomTypeCoeffs_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00065       readDArray<double>(in, "atomTypeCoeffs", atomTypeCoeffs_, nAtomType_);
00066 
00067       read<int>(in, "nBuffer", nBuffer_);
00068       read<int>(in, "nWave", nWave_);
00069       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00070       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00071       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_);
00072       accumulators_.allocate(nWave_);
00073      
00074       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00075          accumulators_[i].setParam(nBuffer_);
00076       }
00077  
00078       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "waveIntVectors", waveIntVectors_, nWave_);
00079       isInitialized_ = true;
00080    }
00081 
00082    /*
00083    * Clear accumulators.
00084    */
00085    void MigratingVanHove::setup() 
00086    {
00087       replicaMovePtr_->registerObserver(*this);
00088       assert (nBuffer_ > 0);
00089       assert (nWave_ > 0);
00090       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00091          accumulators_[i].clear();
00092       }
00093    }
00094  
00096    void MigratingVanHove::sample(long iStep) 
00097    {
00098       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00099 
00100          Vector  position;
00101          std::complex<double>  expFactor;
00102          double  product, coeff;
00103          System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00104          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator  atomIter;
00105          int  nSpecies, iSpecies, i;
00106          makeWaveVectors();
00107 
00108          // Set all Fourier modes to zero
00109          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00110             fourierModes_[i] = std::complex<double>(0.0, 0.0);
00111          }
00112  
00113          // Loop over all atoms to calculate Fourier modes
00114          nSpecies = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00115          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00116             system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00117             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00118                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00119                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00120                   position = atomIter->position();
00121                   coeff    = atomTypeCoeffs_[atomIter->typeId()];
00122  
00123         // Loop over wavevectors
00124                   for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00125                
00126                      product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00127                      expFactor = exp( product*Constants::Im );
00128                      fourierModes_[i] += (coeff*expFactor);
00129        
00130                   }
00131   
00132                }
00133             }
00134 
00135          }
00136          // Add Fourier modes to autocorrelation accumulators
00137          double sqrtV = sqrt(system().boundary().volume());
00138          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00139             accumulators_[i].sample(fourierModes_[i]/sqrtV);
00140          }
00141 
00142       }
00143 
00144    }
00145 
00149    void MigratingVanHove::makeWaveVectors() 
00150    {
00151       Vector    dWave;
00152       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00153       int       i, j;
00154 
00155       // Calculate wavevectors
00156       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00157          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00158          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00159             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00160             dWave *= waveIntVectors_[i][j];
00161             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00162          }
00163       }
00164    }
00165 
00166    void MigratingVanHove::output() 
00167    {
00168       std::string suffix;
00169       int i, j;
00170 
00171       // Echo parameters to a log file
00172       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00173       writeParam(outputFile_);
00174       outputFile_.close();
00175 
00176       // Output autocorrelation functions to file
00177       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00178       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00179 
00180          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00181             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][j], 5);
00182          }
00183          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00184          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00185          accumulators_[i].output(outputFile_);
00186          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00187          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00188 
00189       }
00190       outputFile_.close();
00191 
00192    }
00193 
00194    void MigratingVanHove::update(const sendRecvPair &partners)
00195    {
00196       int size;
00197       size = memorySize(accumulators_);
00198       size += memorySize(fourierModes_);
00199       size += memorySize(nBuffer_);
00200       size += memorySize(nSample_);
00201       
00202       MemoryOArchive sendCurrent;
00203       sendCurrent.allocate(size);
00204       
00205       sendCurrent << accumulators_;
00206       sendCurrent << fourierModes_;
00207       sendCurrent << nBuffer_;
00208       sendCurrent << nSample_;
00209       
00210       MemoryIArchive recvPartner;
00211       recvPartner.allocate(size);
00212 
00213       MPI::Request req;
00214       sendCurrent.iSend(*communicatorPtr_, req, partners[0]);
00215       recvPartner.recv(*communicatorPtr_, partners[1]);
00216       req.Wait();
00217       
00218       recvPartner >> accumulators_;
00219       recvPartner >> fourierModes_;
00220       recvPartner >> nBuffer_;
00221       recvPartner >> nSample_;
00222    }

00227    void MigratingVanHove::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)

00233    void MigratingVanHove::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
